fn.p: Edited by: Brahim Tabarki Melaiki, University of Sousse, Tunisia
Reviewed by: Alison Kesson, University of Sydney, Australia; Mélodie Aubart, Necker Children's Maladies Hospital, France; Hubert G. Niesters, University Medical Center Groningen, Netherlands
This article was submitted to Pediatric Neurology, a section of the journal Frontiers in Neurology
†These authors have contributed equally to this work and share first authorship
